  message: true

  freeze: auto

## 1. Apply eligibility criteria

### Inclusion criteria

-   Age \>= 12 years



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Age >= 12yo:  335  individuals
```


:::
:::



-   Obs period 1st Oct 2020 - 30 Apr 2022



::: {.cell}

:::



-   Apply the inclusion criteria:



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Total number of all outcome events in the observation period:  353 , from  226  individuals
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Number of each outcome before applying exclusion criteria:
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 3 × 2
  event_name         n_event
  <chr>                <int>
1 Myocarditis             50
2 Pulmonary embolism     217
3 Thrombocytopenia        86
```


:::
:::



### Exclusion criteria

#### Missing COVID-19 vacc date, vaccine dose and vaccine brand



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Missing vaccination info:  0  individuals
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Summary of different types of missing vacc info: 
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
  incomplete_dose1 incomplete_dose2 incomplete_dose3 dose2_without_dose1
1                0                0                0                   0
  dose3_without_dose1_or_2
1                        0
```


:::
:::



#### Heterologious dose (For BNT & ChAd only)



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Heterologious dose 1 and 2:  38  individuals
```


:::
:::



#### Missing COVID-19 infection date



::: {.cell}

:::



#### Individuals with \<3 years of data availability prior to 1st Oct 2020



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Individuals with <3 years of data availability prior to 1st Oct 2020  0  individuals
```


:::
:::



-   Apply the general exclusion criteria to all tables



::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Generally excluded individuals:  38
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}
